intro:
Command your arsenal!
Defend the realm. Enjoy tower defense.
Your battalion is humanity's last hope.
description:
Last Battalion Defense blends intense arcade shooter action with deep strategy and tower-defense mechanics. Command humanity’s final defensive line across 3 unique maps as you battle through 5 escalating waves of soldiers, armored vehicles, and military convoys. Manage powerful weapon systems and upgrade your defenses between waves to survive the onslaught.

Strategic Arsenal Management

Your success depends on mastering four specialized military weapon systems, each serving a distinct tactical purpose:

Artillery: Shreds infantry with rapid, suppressive fire.

Cannon: Delivers devastating area damage, wiping out troops and breaking armored vehicles.

Mortar: Provides explosive bombardments to halt enemy advances.

Patriot Missile System: A dominant all-purpose weapon capable of eliminating any threat with overwhelming force.

Each weapon offers unique strengths, letting you create the perfect defensive setup for every battlefield.

Dynamic Shop & Upgrade System

Between enemy waves, head to the Armory to manage your battlefield economy. Spend your earned coins to:

Purchase new weapon turrets

Repair damaged defenses

Upgrade your firepower

Unlock additional fortified positions

Every decision matters—expand your coverage, reinforce your strongholds, or save resources for later waves.

Tactical Depth & Adaptation

When the pressure becomes overwhelming, call in devastating air support to clear enemy forces and regain control.
As waves grow stronger, faster, and more coordinated, you must constantly adapt—balancing repairs, upgrades, expansion, and ability usage to endure the escalating assault.
